channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 利润下降，Vontobel 将采取更多削减成本措施
item.description: Vontobel to take additional cost-cutting measures as profit falls reut.rs/3SuH4tG

item.title: 马士基警告供应过剩将打击利润，并淡化红海的推动作用
item.description: Maersk warns oversupply to hit profits and plays down Red Sea boost reut.rs/49daAva

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行第四季度利润超预期，并上调股息
item.description: Credit Agricole's Q4 profit beats forecasts, hikes dividend reut.rs/3Uxr8sY

item.title: 日本投资巨头软银（SoftBank）宣布，在截至 12 月的三个月内，该公司净利润达到 66 亿美元，从而结束了连败的颓势。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: SoftBank snapped its losing streak as the Japanese investment giant said that net profit hit $6.6 billion in the three months to December. More here: reut.rs/3wb3lVT

item.title: 迪斯尼宣布了一系列消息，包括投资《堡垒之夜》制作商 Epic Games，以及计划在 2025 年推出 ESPN 流媒体服务。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description: Disney made a slew of announcements including an investment in ‘Fortnite’ maker Epic Games and plans to launch an ESPN streaming service in 2025. More here: reut.rs/3Sv5K51

item.title: 软银五个季度以来首次盈利，净收入达 66 亿美元
item.description: SoftBank posts first profit in five quarters with $6.6 billion net income reut.rs/3uqzFDz

item.title: Breakingviews - 软银的新焦点为其带来强劲的发展后劲
item.description: Breakingviews - SoftBank’s new focus gives it strong tailwinds reut.rs/3HUHPHv reut.rs/3HUHPHv

item.title: 观看：从 Facebook 如何应对深度伪造，到机器人为何能在自己的游戏中击败银行家，这就是人工智能时代
item.description: WATCH: From how Facebook is tackling deepfakes, to why bots could beat bankers at their own game, this is Generation AI

item.title: 尽管自动化行业增速放缓，西门子利润仍超预期
item.description: Siemens profit tops forecast despite automation sector slowdown reut.rs/3SNQ5iK

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行和法国兴业银行业绩凸显法国喜忧参半的命运
item.description: Credit Agricole, SocGen results highlight mixed French fortunes reut.rs/3OwuSra

item.title: Breakingviews - 阿里巴巴的价值理由难以令人信服
item.description: Breakingviews - Alibaba makes an unconvincing case for value reut.rs/4br5Tz7 reut.rs/4br5Tz7

item.title: 观看：北朝鲜议会正式通过了执政党劳动党的政策决定，并投票废除了有关与首尔经济关系的法律，包括有关金刚山旅游项目运营的特别法。
item.description: WATCH: North Korea's assembly, which takes formal steps to adopt policy decisions of the ruling Workers' Party, voted to abolish laws governing economic ties with Seoul, including the special law on the operation of the Mount Kumgang tourism project reut.rs/4bp5mhn

item.title: Breakingviews - 习近平可以等待 "除中国之外的任何地方 "贸易的到来
item.description: Breakingviews - Xi can wait out the Anywhere-But-China trade reut.rs/3SNOJVc reut.rs/3SNOJVc

item.title: 观看：受益于强劲的盈利，基准标普 500 指数创下收盘纪录新高。迪士尼股价在盘后交易中攀升，Arm Holdings 收盘后大涨，Chipotle 涨幅超过 7%，福特股价上涨 6%。
item.description: WATCH: The benchmark S&P 500 registered a record closing high aided by strong earnings. Shares of Disney climbed in after-hours trading, Arm Holdings skyrocketed after the closing bell, Chipotle gained more than 7% and Ford shares rose 6% reut.rs/3OzGFEW

item.title: 由于成本压力，3M 印度公司九个季度以来利润增长最小
item.description: 3M India posts smallest profit growth in nine quarters as costs bite reut.rs/4bwmPo8

item.title: 观看：Uber 公布了自上市以来的首次年度盈利，其核心乘车共享业务收入增长了 34%，部分原因是拉丁美洲和亚太地区市场的 "超预期行程增长"。
item.description: WATCH: Uber posted its first annual profit since its IPO as revenue from its core ride-share business grew 34%, driven in part from 'outsized trip growth' in Latin America and Asia Pacific markets reut.rs/3HTSwdn

item.title: 在第四季度营收不及华尔街预期后，Snap 下跌超过 32%，该公司正努力与 Meta 和 Alphabet 等重量级公司争夺广告收入。更多信息
item.description: Snap slumped more than 32% after fourth-quarter revenue missed Wall Street expectations, with the company struggling to compete for advertising dollars against heavyweights like Meta and Alphabet. Read more: reut.rs/3uhEkI3

item.title: 自 2023 年 1 月以来，马来西亚已收回 480 万美元的 1MDB 资产
item.description: Malaysia has recovered $4.8 mln in 1MDB assets since Jan 2023 reut.rs/3ODfA3L

item.title: 马士基称红海危机给 2024 年盈利带来不确定性
item.description: Maersk says Red Sea crisis poses uncertainty to 2024 earnings reut.rs/3HPSLWM

item.title: 微软公司表示，将通过与印度初创公司 Sarvam AI 合作，支持基于语音的生成式人工智能应用的开发。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Microsoft will support the development of voice-based generative artificial intelligence applications through a partnership with Indian startup Sarvam AI, the Windows-maker said. More here: reut.rs/42z8tir

item.title: 利润下降，Vontobel 将采取更多削减成本措施
item.description: Vontobel to take additional cost-cutting measures as profit falls reut.rs/3UDFDfb

item.title: 迪斯尼公司首席执行官鲍勃-艾格（Bob Iger）发布了一系列公告回击激进投资者，其中包括对《堡垒之夜》制作商 Epic Games 的大手笔投资，以及在 2025 年推出 ESPN 流媒体服务的计划。更多内容请点击这里：
item.description: Disney CEO Bob Iger hit back at activist investors with a slew of announcements, including a splashy investment in ‘Fortnite’ maker Epic Games and plans to launch an ESPN streaming service in 2025. More here: reut.rs/3Sv5K51

item.description: Brazil digital bank Inter&Co beats profit forecasts in fourth quarter reut.rs/4btklqs

item.title: 全球人寿保险公司（Globe Life）利润因承保和投资回报增加而增长
item.description: Globe Life profit rises on stronger underwriting, investment returns reut.rs/487PtJk

item.title: 观看：华尔街主要股指上涨，基准股指标准普尔500指数创下收盘纪录新高，投资者对美国整体盈利强劲表示赞赏
item.description: WATCH: Wall Street's major stock indexes rose, with the benchmark S&P 500 registering a record closing high as investors applauded overall strength in US earnings reut.rs/3OzGFEW

item.title: 观看：中国阿里巴巴第三季度营收未达分析师预期，零售市场疲软和中国经济复苏乏力令这家电子商务公司受到冲击
item.description: WATCH: China's Alibaba missed analysts' estimates for third-quarter revenue as the e-commerce company was hurt by softness in the retail market and China's weak economic recovery reut.rs/49uYU6J
